name: Bullet Soul Double Soul Pack
overview: A compilation of the two shooters : Bullet Soul and Bullet Soul Infinite Burst Bullet Soul : A good old fashioned vertical shooter that also has a Bullet Hell element such as 2 players co-op, scoring mechanics, hidden bonuses, online ranking. The characters have been designed by Akio Watanabe and the soundtrack by RESONATOR (Kenji Ito and Kota Takahashi) Bullet Soul Infinite Burst : This game adds new game modes such as Burst Mode but also the famous Caravan Mode. All game modes have been rebalanced in terms of appearances and enemies attacks so that even players who completed the previous game can play it with a fresh mind.
